title: Skin refunds for 'ruined' champs
body: I got every Katarina skin before her rework (and one just after her rework) because I loved playing her, now I just hate her play style and don't like playing her at all. I feel ripped off that now I have so many skins for a champ I no longer like/play because they decided to change her. Now I don't want to buy any skins for anyone anymore in case they do the same thing again.
